title: Dealing with Haters & Cancel Culture
description:
If you put your life out there online long enough, you'll eventually run into haters and negative comments. This week, Tasia and Camo address some specific harmful feedback they've received on their videos and commentary on their personalities. They also discuss educating yourself so that you grow versus immediately jumping to judgement against someone, as well as why they won't change how they represent themselves for any person or brand.
Watch "Unfazed and Unbothered" on YouTube
As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/unfazed
